text: Dangshi, wo rang tian fang [zhu] chengwei shiren de huiji zhongxin he anning de, bing mingling ba yi bu la xin de zhanli chu zuowei yige libai di difang [ru zhao jin huan you tian fang hou zai ci li liang bai]. Wo mingling yi bu la xin he [ta de erzi] yi si ma yi [shuo]:“Ni lia dang wei huan you tian fang zhe, tingliu qizhong qidao zhe he jugong koutou zhe er qingjie wo de fangwu [ji tian fang].”
